  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(String orderNo, String orderDate, LngLat restaurantLoc, String creditCardNumber, String creditCardExpiry, String cvv, String[] orderItems, int priceTotalInPence, String orderOutcome)
      Create the order
      Parameters:
      orderNo - the eight-character hexadecimal string assigned to this order in the orders REST service endpoint
      orderDate - the date the order was created
      restaurantLoc - participated restaurant locations
      creditCardNumber - customer's credit card number that they use for order payment
      creditCardExpiry - the expiry data of customer's credit card, usually in MM/YY format
      cvv - the 3-4 digits number at the backside of customer's credit card
      orderItems - items of the order, an array of pizza names
      priceTotalInPence - total cost of the order, include the 100p fixed delivery charge
      orderOutcome - the outcome of an order

    • getOrderOutcome

      public static String getOrderOutcome(Restaurant[] participants, String[] orderItems, String creditCardNumber, String creditCardExpiry, String cvv, String orderDate, int priceTotalInPence) throws ParseException
      get the delivery cost, including delivery charge of 1 pound (100 pence)
      Parameters:
      orderItems - the ordered pizza being delivery
      creditCardNumber - customer's credit card number
      creditCardExpiry - expiry date of customer's credit card
      cvv - 3 - 4 digit number
      orderDate - the date the customer ordered pizza
      priceTotalInPence - total price that one delivery cost (pence)
      Returns:
      cost in pence of having all of these items delivered by drone, including the standard delivery charge of 100p per delivery
      Throws:
      ParseException - If the given orderDate input cannot be parsed .
